snippet.title: Him & Her | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Him & Her is a challenging Puzzle-Platformer in which the player must find a path to their significant other by defying gravity.
 Can you find love amidst darkness?
 
eShop (NA): https://bit.ly/2Q2B7nY
eShop (EU): https://bit.ly/2EUrk1c

About QUByte Interactive
QUByte Interactive is a Brazilian game developer and publisher focused on delivering high-quality experiences across the most diverse platforms, from mobile to PC to Video game consoles, with business partners in several countries such as USA, Canada, Germany, Japan and China. All Rights Reserved (C) 2020 QUByte Interactive.

About Game Nacional
We are the first startup to help independent Brazilian developers. We want investors with future vision, which seek quality projects. Even without investment, we help young talents, so they can pursue their dream and promote. Are you an investor? Contact us.
